Calculate PFIQ-7 (Pelvic Floor Impact Questionnaire) Scores

Source: R/calculate_pfiq7.R
calculate_pfiq7.Rd

Calculates domain-specific and total scores from the PFIQ-7 questionnaire, which measures the impact of pelvic floor disorders on quality of life across three domains: urinary (UIQ-7), colorectal-anal (CRAIQ-7), and pelvic organ prolapse (POPIQ-7).

Usage

calculate_pfiq7(questionnaire_data, verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

questionnaire_data

A data frame containing the PFIQ-7 responses with 21 columns (7 questions × 3 domains). Column names should follow the pattern 'uiq1', 'uiq2', ..., 'craiq1', 'craiq2', ..., 'popiq1', 'popiq2', etc.

verbose

Logical indicating whether to print detailed logging information during calculation. Default is FALSE.

Value

A data frame with calculated scores for each domain (UIQ-7, CRAIQ-7, POPIQ-7) and the total PFIQ-7 score. Each score ranges from 0 to 100, with higher scores indicating greater impact on quality of life.

Details

The PFIQ-7 consists of three scales with 7 questions each:

  • UIQ-7: Questions about urinary symptoms

  • CRAIQ-7: Questions about colorectal-anal symptoms

  • POPIQ-7: Questions about pelvic organ prolapse symptoms

Each question is scored from 0 to 3:

  • 0: Not at all

  • 1: Somewhat

  • 2: Moderately

  • 3: Quite a bit

Domain scores are calculated by: (sum of domain item scores) * (100/21) Total PFIQ-7 score is the sum of all three domain scores (range 0-300)

Examples

# Example 1: Basic usage with minimal data
sample_data <- data.frame(
  uiq1 = c(1, 2, 0), uiq2 = c(2, 1, 1), uiq3 = c(0, 0, 0),
  uiq4 = c(1, 2, 1), uiq5 = c(3, 2, 0), uiq6 = c(0, 1, 0),
  uiq7 = c(2, 2, 1),
  craiq1 = c(0, 1, 0), craiq2 = c(1, 0, 0), craiq3 = c(0, 0, 0),
  craiq4 = c(0, 1, 0), craiq5 = c(0, 0, 0), craiq6 = c(1, 0, 0),
  craiq7 = c(0, 0, 0),
  popiq1 = c(2, 3, 0), popiq2 = c(1, 2, 0), popiq3 = c(2, 1, 0),
  popiq4 = c(0, 0, 0), popiq5 = c(1, 0, 0), popiq6 = c(2, 1, 0),
  popiq7 = c(3, 2, 0)
)
calculate_pfiq7(sample_data)
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Starting PFIQ-7 calculation
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:44] PFIQ-7 calculation completed successfully
#> # A tibble: 3 × 5
#>   patient_id uiq7_score craiq7_score popiq7_score pfiq7_total
#>        <int>      <dbl>        <dbl>        <dbl>       <dbl>
#> 1          1       42.9         9.52         52.4       105. 
#> 2          2       47.6         9.52         42.9       100  
#> 3          3       14.3         0             0          14.3

# Example 2: Using verbose mode for detailed logging
sample_data_2 <- data.frame(
  uiq1 = c(2, 3), uiq2 = c(1, 3), uiq3 = c(1, 2),
  uiq4 = c(2, 3), uiq5 = c(1, 2), uiq6 = c(0, 2),
  uiq7 = c(0, 1),
  craiq1 = c(0, 1), craiq2 = c(0, 0), craiq3 = c(1, 0),
  craiq4 = c(0, 0), craiq5 = c(0, 0), craiq6 = c(0, 1),
  craiq7 = c(1, 0),
  popiq1 = c(0, 1), popiq2 = c(0, 0), popiq3 = c(0, 0),
  popiq4 = c(0, 1), popiq5 = c(0, 0), popiq6 = c(0, 0),
  popiq7 = c(0, 0)
)
calculate_pfiq7(sample_data_2, verbose = TRUE)
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Verbose logging enabled
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Starting PFIQ-7 calculation
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Input questionnaire_data dimensions: 2 rows, 21 columns
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Validating input data
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Data validation completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Calculating domain scores
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Processing uiq domain with 7 columns
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 1 uiq calculation: sum=7, non-NA values=7, scaled score=33.3333333333333
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 2 uiq calculation: sum=16, non-NA values=7, scaled score=76.1904761904762
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Processing craiq domain with 7 columns
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 1 craiq calculation: sum=2, non-NA values=7, scaled score=9.52380952380952
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 2 craiq calculation: sum=2, non-NA values=7, scaled score=9.52380952380952
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Processing popiq domain with 7 columns
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 1 popiq calculation: sum=0, non-NA values=7, scaled score=0
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 2 popiq calculation: sum=2, non-NA values=7, scaled score=9.52380952380952
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Calculating total PFIQ-7 score
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Summary of scores:
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] UIQ-7 mean: 54.7619047619048
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] CRAIQ-7 mean: 9.52380952380952
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] POPIQ-7 mean: 4.76190476190476
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] PFIQ-7 total mean: 69.0476190476191
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:44] PFIQ-7 calculation completed successfully
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Output pfiq7_scores dimensions: 2 rows, 5 columns
#> # A tibble: 2 × 5
#>   patient_id uiq7_score craiq7_score popiq7_score pfiq7_total
#>        <int>      <dbl>        <dbl>        <dbl>       <dbl>
#> 1          1       33.3         9.52         0           42.9
#> 2          2       76.2         9.52         9.52        95.2

# Example 3: Handling missing data with verbose logging
sample_data_3 <- data.frame(
  uiq1 = c(1, 2, NA), uiq2 = c(2, 1, 1), uiq3 = c(0, 0, 0),
  uiq4 = c(1, NA, 1), uiq5 = c(3, 2, 0), uiq6 = c(0, 1, 0),
  uiq7 = c(2, 2, 1),
  craiq1 = c(0, 1, 0), craiq2 = c(NA, 0, 0), craiq3 = c(0, 0, 0),
  craiq4 = c(0, 1, NA), craiq5 = c(0, 0, 0), craiq6 = c(1, 0, 0),
  craiq7 = c(0, 0, 0),
  popiq1 = c(2, 3, 0), popiq2 = c(1, NA, 0), popiq3 = c(2, 1, 0),
  popiq4 = c(0, 0, 0), popiq5 = c(1, 0, NA), popiq6 = c(2, 1, 0),
  popiq7 = c(NA, 2, 0)
)
calculate_pfiq7(sample_data_3, verbose = TRUE)
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Verbose logging enabled
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Starting PFIQ-7 calculation

#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Processing uiq domain with 7 columns

#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 2 uiq calculation: sum=8, non-NA values=6, scaled score=44.4444444444444
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 3 uiq calculation: sum=3, non-NA values=6, scaled score=16.6666666666667
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Processing craiq domain with 7 columns

#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 2 craiq calculation: sum=2, non-NA values=7, scaled score=9.52380952380952
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 3 craiq calculation: sum=0, non-NA values=6, scaled score=0
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Processing popiq domain with 7 columns

#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 2 popiq calculation: sum=7, non-NA values=6, scaled score=38.8888888888889
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Patient 3 popiq calculation: sum=0, non-NA values=6, scaled score=0
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:44] Calculating total PFIQ-7 score
